title: Airport Diner
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, International, Western, Fast food, Beer/Wine, European, Fusion, German, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available.  Hildesheim Airport's restaurant (mainly used for private flying lessons). Has an extensive varied menu including some vegan choices that were served in the now-closed vegetarian restaurant So-Ja. These include burgers, chili sin carne and baked potatoes. Run by the organization AWO that manages various social projects all over Germany.
